title: AstraZeneca’s Covid-19 Vaccine Is Safe, 79% Effective in Late-Stage U.S. Trials
content:
1. AstraZeneca’s Covid-19 Vaccine Is Safe, 79% Effective in Late-Stage U.S. Trials  The Wall Street Journal
  2. AstraZeneca, once touted as a pandemic slayer, faces challenges  The Washington Post
  3. AstraZeneca vaccine is 79% effective against symptomatic Covid-19, company says  CNN
  4. AstraZeneca: US data shows vaccine effective for all ages  The Associated Press
  5. Covid-19 live updates: As restrictions drop, new coronavirus infections in the U.S. begin to rise after months of declines  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
